mapper.insert: insert into item_order (orderTime, itemId, number, price, userId, comment) values (#{orderTime}, #{itemId}, #{number}, #{price}, #{userId}, #{comment})
mapper.select: select o.id, o.orderTime, o.number, o.price, u.phoneNumber, u.name, i.itemName, i.image from item_order o left join user u on u.id = o.userId left join item i on i.id = o.itemId where o.userId = #{id}
